name: Cliché - Critical Change
description:
Cliché…
A phrase that is overused…
It betrays a lack of original thought…
Has the time come for a change?
A critical change!

Raise Muki, a muscular girl with a heart of a maiden in any way you want! Guide her so she can be with her beloved prince! Will things go horribly wrong, or horribly right? It is all up to you!
  • Comedy, Fantasy, Adventure
  • Raising Sim, Puzzle & Visual Novel
  • Multiple Endings & Unlockable Gallery
  • Rated Everyone
